title: The Blood Run Trilogy by Christine Dougherty (Perseu)
description:
It is 1985 and the United States is reeling from a disease that has taken huge,
bloody bites out of the country as people are changed into vampires. The
survivors have grouped together in remote outposts and the National Guard
is the lifeline that runs between the outposts, bringing the news and supplies.

In Wereburg New York a young woman named Destiny Riser has lost
her parents in the plague but saved her little brother. Chance. But the
outpost she brings him to is still young and learning and in an accident
of fate it is ravaged by vampires. Destiny seer her brother bit and
changed and from that moment on, rechristens herself 'Promise" and
vows to release Chance from his nightmare, nighttime existence.

With the assistance of the black horses, she combs the barren
forests surrounding Wereburg and even her old development,
Willow's End, searching for Chance; desperate to end his misery.
But then the National Guard brings a stranger to Wereburg, am
man who is purportedly a fabled 'half and half' - someone ho has
been bit but who has at least a partial immunity to the disease.
That man will change everything that Promise believes.


The Blood Run Trilogy
By: Christine Dougherty
Format: Epub
Language: EN
Pages: 795
